scripts.push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.demo: node bin/joey-the-differ.js -s demo/source.json -t demo/target.json -c demo/options.js -o demo/diffs.json
scripts.demo:bulk: node bin/joey-the-differ.js -s demo/bulk/sources -t demo/bulk/targets -c demo/options.js -o demo/bulk/diffs
scripts.demo:bulk:singleout: node bin/joey-the-differ.js -s demo/bulk/sources -t demo/bulk/targets -c demo/options.js -o demo/bulk/diffs/1+2.json
scripts.demo:bulk:1tomany: node bin/joey-the-differ.js -s demo/bulk/sources/1.json -t demo/bulk/targets -c demo/options.js -o demo/bulk/diffs/1tomany.json
scripts.demo:bulk:manyto1: node bin/joey-the-differ.js -s demo/bulk/sources -t demo/bulk/targets/1.json -c demo/options.js -o demo/bulk/diffs/manyto1.json
